name: Third Ear
description: Founded in 1998, LatinWorks is a cultural branding agency at the forefront of America’s cultural transformation. A three-time Ad Age “Multicultural Agency of the Year” and two-time recipient of Ad Age’s “Agency A-List” award, LatinWorks has a legacy of multicultural excellence and world-class creativity. Comprised of 150 diverse and forward-thinking people from all over the world, LatinWorks is based in Austin, TX and is minority-certified and affiliated with the Omnicom Group.
